title: Activities of Secretary-General in Italy, 14-17 October (UN - United Nations)
text: ( Source : UN - United Nations ) Upon arrival on Thursday morning, the Secretary-General addressed a joint meeting of the Chamber of Senate and Deputies in a special session to mark the sixtieth anniversary of Italy 's membership in the United
